items.label: 572cfd895457a3d966ade1d1
items.name: Residential TOU Non-Demand Service (Bundled)
items.description: This rate is representative of the charges associated with Delmarva Power & Light Co.'s Standard Offer Service (SoS).
items.basicinformationcomments:
Primary Discount:
Where service is supplied and metered at primary voltage and the Customer owns and maintains all transforming, switching, and protective equipment, the monthly bill as calculated in accordance with the standard rate table will be decreased by five percent (5%) before the application of any applicable supply charges under Standard Offer Service for the combined Electric Supply & Delivery Service and any tax imposed by governmental authority upon the Company sales.
items.energycomments:
Rate = Distribution Charge + Supply Service Charge
Adjustments = Renewable Portfolio Standard charge + Green Energy fund + Low Income charge + Procurement Cost adjustment
